original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1106)@</color>消耗自身 <color=#ccffcc>10%</color> 體力恢復我方全體武將 <color=#ccffcc>32%</color> 體力，且在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4568)@</color> 秒內提升武將 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4568)@</color> 點武力和智力。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1106)@</color> Consume yourself <color=#ccffcc>10%</color> Recover all of us Generals <color=#ccffcc>60%</color> physical strength.
